mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( content, memberId, postId, personalId, password ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{memberId}, #{postId}, #{personalId}, #{password} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.content, c.createDate, c.modifyDate, m.nickname, c.personalId FROM comment c left join member m on c.memberId = m.id WHERE postId = #{postId} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE postId = #{postId}
SELECT c.id, c.content, c.createDate, c.modifyDate, m.nickname, c.personalId FROM comment c left join member m on c.memberId = m.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
